languages.text: {n}Арбитр застыл, погруженный в раздумья, больше похожий на статую, чем на живого человека. Только когда Глейто чуть взрыкивает, привлекая внимание Соломона, тот отмирает и поднимает глаза.{/n} "Пришли с последним напутствием, Вольный Торговец? Сейчас самое время — другого шанса может и не быть".

{n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр застыл, погруженный в раздумья, больше похожий на статую, чем на живого человека. Только когда Глейто чуть взрыкивает, привлекая внимание Соломона, тот отмирает и поднимает глаза.{/n} "Пришли с последним напутствием, Вольный Торговец? Сейчас самое время — другого шанса может и не быть".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはじっと動かず、深く考え込んでいる。生きている人間というより、まるで彫像のようだ。グライトが低く唸り声を上げてソロモーンの注意を引いたとき、彼はようやくじっとしたままの姿勢から目を上げた。{/n}「お別れの言葉でも言いに来たんですか？ローグトレーダー。この機会を逃せば、次はないかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはじっと動かず、深く考え込んでいる。生きている人間というより、まるで彫像のようだ。グライトが低く唸り声を上げてソロモーンの注意を引いたとき、彼はようやくじっとしたままの姿勢から目を上げた。{/n}「お別れの言葉でも言いに来たんですか？ローグトレーダー。この機会を逃せば、次はないかもしれません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne ist bewegungslos in Gedanken versunken und wirkt eher wie eine Statue als eine lebende Person. Nur wenn Glaito laut knurrt und Solomornes Aufmerksamkeit erregt, regt er sich und hebt den Blick.{/n} "Kommt Ihr mit Abschiedsworten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Jetzt ist die Zeit dafür – eine weitere Gelegenheit gibt es vielleicht nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne ist bewegungslos in Gedanken versunken und wirkt eher wie eine Statue als eine lebende Person. Nur wenn Glaito laut knurrt und Solomornes Aufmerksamkeit erregt, regt er sich und hebt den Blick.{/n} "Kommt Ihr mit Abschiedsworten, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Jetzt ist die Zeit dafür – eine weitere Gelegenheit gibt es vielleicht nicht."

languages.text: {n}Immobile comme une statue, Solomorne est plongé dans ses pensées. Ce n'est que lorsque Glaito laisse échapper un grognement rauque qu'il semble reprendre vie et relève les yeux.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} me faire vos adieux, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Vous faites bien. Je ne sais pas si nous aurons l'occasion de nous recroiser. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Immobile comme une statue, Solomorne est plongé dans ses pensées. Ce n'est que lorsque Glaito laisse échapper un grognement rauque qu'il semble reprendre vie et relève les yeux.{/n} « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} me faire vos adieux, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Vous faites bien. Je ne sais pas si nous aurons l'occasion de nous recroiser. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne está muy quieto, sumido en sus pensamientos; se parece más a una estatua que a una persona. Únicamente reacciona alzando la mirada cuando Glaito emite un gruñido gutural que llama su atención.{/n} «¿Viene a despedirse, Comerciante Independiente? Ahora es el momento; puede que no tengamos otra oportunidad».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne está muy quieto, sumido en sus pensamientos; se parece más a una estatua que a una persona. Únicamente reacciona alzando la mirada cuando Glaito emite un gruñido gutural que llama su atención.{/n} «¿Viene a despedirse, Comerciante Independiente? Ahora es el momento; puede que no tengamos otra oportunidad».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙依然在沉思着，看起来不像是活生生的人，更像是一尊雕像。只有当格雷托发出了低沉的咆哮声，引起索罗蒙注意时，他才打破了沉默，抬起了头。{/n}“有什么最后的赠言要说吗，行商浪人？如果有什么话要说，也只能趁现在说了，以后可能不会再有机会了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙依然在沉思着，看起来不像是活生生的人，更像是一尊雕像。只有当格雷托发出了低沉的咆哮声，引起索罗蒙注意时，他才打破了沉默，抬起了头。{/n}“有什么最后的赠言要说吗，行商浪人？如果有什么话要说，也只能趁现在说了，以后可能不会再有机会了。”

languages.text: {n}Hareketsiz duran Solomorne, derin düşüncelere dalmışa benziyor. Yaşayan bir insandan çok bir heykeli andırıyor. Ancak Glaito'nun alçak bir hırlamayla dikkatini çekmesi üzerine durgunluğunu bozup gözlerini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Veda etmeye mi geldin Hür Tacir? Şu an tam zamanı. Başka fırsat olmayabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne is still, deep in thought, looking more like a statue than a living person. Only when Glaito lets out a low growl, drawing Solomorne's attention, does he break his stillness and raise his eyes.{/n} "Come with some parting words, Rogue Trader? Now is the time — there may not be another opportunity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hareketsiz, derin düşüncelere dalmış bir hâlde duruyor. Yaşayan bir insandan çok bir heykeli andırıyor. Ancak Glaito alçak bir hırlama çıkarıp Solomorne'un dikkatini çektiğinde durgunluğunu bozup gözlerini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Veda etmeye mi geldin Hür Tacir? Şu an tam zamanı. Başka fırsat olmayabilir."
